name: Artisan 6 Page
summary: An A6PAGE file is a memory design page created by version 6 of FOREVER Artisan, an app for preserving memories in scrapbooks, calendars, etc. It is a Zip archive containing multiple files that store information about the design elements of the page, including text, images, shapes, and its metadata . FOREVER introduced A6PAGE files when it released version 6 of Artisan, replacing .ARTPAGE files used by version 5 of Artisan.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
